story.text: (Adds details) Jan 3 (Reuters) - GENERAL MOTORS CORP. (GM.N) Current Prior Rating Sell Neutral Price target $25 $30 --Banc of America Securities said the carmaker's lower first-half market share, despite a peak new product pipeline, should get investors worried about a sharp fourth-quarter decline in new product volume. --Also, GM's vehicle overpricing and inventory levels are worse than the first quarter of 2005 and when the company last missed earnings expectations, Banc of America added. (Reporting by Debojyoti Ghosh in Bangalore)
story.title: update 1 - research alert - bofa cuts general motors to sell
